channel.title: Qq
channel.description:
Well, today I have finally reached my goal, which was to get full bandos, dragonfire shield, fury, whip etc etc.. So then when I finally got my bandos chestplate today, (I spent all day at blue dragons.) I decided to go to the clan wars and test the gear out.. I was there for about 3 hours, then I started to get a bit tired (it was 4:00am) but still continued to play.. So I kept going back and fourth in the white portal.. Then I mistakenly clicked the red portal.. I ran in, then got barraged and dragon claw rushed in seconds. I didn't think anything of it at the time because I thought I was in the white portal.. So after I died I realized my guy had nothing on him and lost everything.. So yeah Gf bank.. QQ
Dejavu I guess? 3 years ago the same thing happened, but I only lost rune (G). :P
[s]But yeah, just wanted to tell you guys, even though I'll probably get flamed in seconds.. :|[/s]
lol I don't know why I told you guys this last night.. I guess a mod should delete it or lock it, seeing how this is topic is pretty much useless...

item.title: Qq
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
